objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#240000;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#990000;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accent-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFC700;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFC700;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg-gradient)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='25' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.6'/><rect x='80' y='80' width='920' height='920' rx='15' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M100 40 C300 10, 600 60, 980 20' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3' fill='none'/><path d='M100 1040 C300 1070, 600 1020, 980 1060' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3' fill='none'/><path d='M40 100 C10 300, 60 600, 20 980' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3' fill='none'/><path d='M1040 100 C1070 300, 1020 600, 1060 980' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3' fill='none'/><rect x='120' y='120' width='840' height='840' rx='10' fill='#000000' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M0 200 C150 150, 300 250, 450 200 C600 150, 750 250, 1080 200' fill='url(#accent-gradient)' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='#000000' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0 880 C150 930, 300 830, 450 880 C600 930, 750 830, 1080 880' fill='url(#accent-gradient)' opacity='0.3'/></svg>

objects.text:
• 3.9L Twin-Turbo V8 with 661 HP
• 0-60 mph in just 3.0 seconds
• Top speed of 205+ mph
• Iconic Rosso Corsa Red finish
Experience the thrill of a lifetime. Luxury on wheels available for a limited time only.

product_details.name: Stunning Ferrari 488 GTB - Pure Italian Masterpiece in Rosso Corsa
product_details.description:
• Iconic Ferrari Rosso Corsa Red exterior finish
• 3.9L Twin-Turbocharged V8 Engine delivering 661 horsepower
• 0-60 mph in just 3.0 seconds
• 7-speed dual-clutch automatic transmission
• Luxurious carbon fiber and leather interior trim
• Premium 5-spoke forged alloy wheels with yellow brake calipers
• Advanced aerodynamic design with side air intakes
• Ferrari's innovative Side Slip Control system
• Top speed of 205+ mph
• Factory-installed sport exhaust system
• Electronic limited-slip differential
• Magnetorheological suspension system
• Latest-generation infotainment system
• Premium carbon-ceramic braking system

banner_details:
The banner features a bold and luxurious automobile advertisement with a dark, dramatic background enhanced by soft, flowing gold linear art. At the top, a strong and prominent text layer (`heading`) introduces the vehicle model in a white, retro-bold font, conveying power and prestige. Below it, the subheading layer (`subheading`) uses an elegant golden typeface to highlight the brand's essence. A bullet-pointed feature list (`description`) details high-performance specifications in clean white text for clarity. The middle section displays the car image (`product_image`), realistically showcasing the red sports car. Near the bottom, an urgency-creating tagline (`tagline`) appears above a smaller supportive description (`description_2`). The price (`price`) is emphasized in large gold typography, and a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) in matching gold contains an actionable label (`cta`) in bold black.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Maroon #240000
- Rich Crimson #990000
- Metallic Gold #D4AF37
- Pure White #FFFFFF
- Jet Black #000000
product_color: The product image features a sleek red Ferrari, where bold color schemes highlight luxury and performance. The dominant cherry red (#B20D18) of the car body is striking and conveys passion and speed. Yellow (#F9D500) accents on the brake calipers and Ferrari emblem create contrast and draw attention, while black (#1A1A1A) elements like the window tint and tire areas add sophistication. Silver (#C0C0C0) in the alloy wheels adds a metallic sheen, enhancing the luxury feel. These colors blend naturally yet stand out vividly against each other, emphasizing the vehicle’s power and elegance. Ideal palette for an ad: #B20D18, #F9D500, #C0C0C0, #1A1A1A.
